name: 甘奈
text: おはよーございまーす
trans: Good morning.

name: 甜花
text: おはよ……ございます……
trans: Good... morning...

name: 甘奈
text: ふわ～っ
trans: *yawn*

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん、あくび……
trans: Na-chan, you yawned...

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、見られちゃった
trans: Ehehe... Oh, you saw that.

name: 甜花
text:
もしかして……
昨日の夜も、レッスンの動画、見てたの……？
trans: Could it be that... you were still watching the video from yesterday's lesson late into the night?

name: 甘奈
text:
ううん、ちょっと気になることがあったから
眠りが浅くなっちゃっただけかも
trans: No, there's just something on my mind so I guess that's why I got less sleep than usual.

name: 甜花
text: （なーちゃん、甜花のために……）
trans: (Na-chan, you're doing all this for Tenka...)

name: 甘奈
text: さ！　早くレッスン室に行こ！
trans: Come on! Let's head to the lesson room!

name: 甘奈
text:
よーし、準備運動終わりっ！
今日も自主練、張り切ってこー
trans:
Alright, we're done with the stretching!
Let's roll up our sleeves for another round fo self-practice.

name: 甜花
text: うん……でも、できるかな……？
trans: Okay... But, will Tenka be able to do it?

name: 甘奈
text:
だいじょーぶ！
甘奈、どうしたらいいか分かったんだ！
trans:
It'll be just fine!
I already know what we should do!

name: 甜花
text:
そうなの……？
なーちゃん、すごい……っ
trans:
Really?
You're amazing, Na-chan.

name: 甘奈
text: えへ、すごいってほどじゃないよー
trans: Ehe, I'm not that amazing though.

name: 甘奈
text: じゃあ、さっそく始めよっか！
trans: So, let's get right to it!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……！
甜花、頑張るね……っ
trans:
Okay!
Tenka will do her best...

name: 甜花
text: あ、また……
trans: Ah, Tenka failed again...

name: 甘奈
text: 大丈夫、ちょっとずつ良くなってるよ
trans: It's alright, you're slowly improving on it now.

name: 甜花
text: でも……何度やってもズレる……
trans: But... Tenka still messes up even though she did this so many times...

name: 甜花
text: やっぱり、ダンス……向いてないのかな……
trans: Maybe Tenka's just... not suited to dancing...

name: 甘奈
text:
そんなことないよ
甜花ちゃんなら絶対大丈夫。できるまでやろ！
trans: That's not true. I'm sure that you can do it. Let's keep on practicing until you nail it down!

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん……
trans: Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: さ、甜花ちゃん！
trans: Come on, Tenka!

name: 甜花
text: ……うん
trans: Okay.

name: 甜花
text: えと……ここで、こう……
trans: Umm... Do it like this here...

name: 甜花
text:
また、ズレた……
でも、あとちょっと……
trans:
Tenka messed up again...
But, just a bit more...

name: 甘奈
text:
……うん、すごくいい感じ……
その調子でいこー……
trans:
Yeah, you're doing great...
Let's keep this up...

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃん、すごく眠そう……
大丈夫？
trans:
Na-chan, you look so sleepy...
Are you alright?

name: 甘奈
text:
う、うん。だいじょーぶ……
いつもどおり、元気でしょ？
trans:
Y-Yeah, I'm just fine...
See? I'm as perky as always.

name: 甘奈
text: ふぅ……
trans: Awh...

name: 甘奈
text: あ、今のはあくびじゃないよ！
trans: I wasn't yawning just now!

name: 甜花
text: やっぱり、なーちゃん眠そう……
trans: Na-chan, you really are sleepy...

name: 甜花
text:
（甜花のためになーちゃん……頑張ってくれてるんだ……
だから、甜花も……）
trans:
(Na-chan did all of these... just for Tenka...
Which is why, Tenka has to put in as much effort...)

name: 甜花
text: ……甜花、頑張る！
trans: Tenka will do her best!

name: 甜花
text: ワン・ツー・スリー・ターン！
trans: One, two, three, and turn!

name: 甜花
text: で、できたよ、なーちゃんっ
trans: T-Tenka did it, Na-chan!

name: 甘奈
text: わぁ！　甜花ちゃん、やったね！
trans: Ooh! You really did, Tenka!

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃんのおかげだよ……
trans: It's all thanks to you, Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text:
んーん、甜花ちゃんが頑張ったからだよ
甘奈は一緒に練習してただけ
trans:
No, it was thanks to your own efforts.
I just happen to be practicing with you.

name: 甜花
text: ありがと、なーちゃん……
trans: Thank you, Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: うん！
trans: No problem!

name: 甘奈
text: ……ふぁ
trans: *yawn*

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん、やっぱり、昨日遅くまで……
trans: Na-chan, you really did stay up late last night...

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ
trans: Ehehe.

name: 甜花
text:
今日は……早く帰ろう……？
なーちゃん、寝ないと……
trans:
Let's go home early today... okay?
You need to get some rest, Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: えへ、そうだね、早く帰ろう！
trans: Ehe, you're right. Let's go home early!

name: 甘奈
text:
ねぇ、甜花ちゃん……
ちょっとお願いしていい？
trans:
Umm, Tenka...
Can I ask you something?

name: 甜花
trans: Hmm?

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈、本当はちょっとがんばったんだ……
trans: I kinda overworked myself...

name: 甘奈
text:
ご褒美に、今日は、
甜花ちゃんのお部屋で一緒に寝ていい……？
trans: As a reward, is it alright if I sleep with you in your room tonight?

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……甜花もそうしたい……
なーちゃん、今日は甘えん坊……
trans:
Nihehe, Tenka's thinking the same thing...
You're quite a baby today, Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、たまにはいいでしょ？
trans: Ehehe, It won't hurt to be like this once in a while, right?

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈、楽しみだな～
trans: I can't wait for tonight.
